q: Newspapers The Home Affairs Committee on Friday published the evidence it has received so far in relation to its investigation into the unauthorised tapping into or hacking of mobile communications . The most interesting bits are from Paul McMullan , who was features editor at the News of the World between 1998 and 2001 when Andy Coulson was deputy editor, and from Max Mosley , who sued the NoW for

`` personal reasons''. It was revealed yesterday that his wife had been having an affair with his Scotland Yard protection officer. In a statement issued by the Tony Blair 's office, Mr David Cameron said: I am very sorry that Andy Coulson has decided to resign as my Director of Communications, although I understand that the continuing pressures on him and his family mean that he feels compelled to do so. Andy Coulson has told me that the focus on him was impeding his ability to do his job and was starting to prove a distraction for the Government `` During his time working for me, Andy Coulson has carried out his role with complete professionalism. He has been a brilliant member of my team and has thrown himself at the job with skill and dedication

There's a lot of pressure when you're young. Now, he said, performing in front of 100 people- or 15,000- feels`` so natural.'' It's unfortunate, and I would rather have not seen the situation. The key Dwaine Caraway gave Michael Vick was less than official, city officials explained. The official Dallas`` keys'' are made from gold or crystal and given out mostly to foreign dignitaries under strict protocol.

DALLAS- NFL Commissioner Roger Goodell is not concerned about Michael Vick being billed as the host of a Super Bowl party because the Eagles quarterback told him it's not true. He has said that on numerous occasions people have been using his name about being involved in some type of a party and he had no intention of participating in that, Roger Goodell said. Speaking at his annual Super Bowl news conference Friday, the commissioner said he's spoken with Michael Vick three times in the last two weeks about his plans.``
